pageContext.description: Possibly from same mould as another specimen in the hoard, but of lighter metal. Decoration is worn. Loop is missing. rough metal remains in lower portion of socket.
pageContext.patina: Grey-green patina with red-gold metal showing at edge.
pageContext.associations: Found with 3 palstaves, 3 socketed celts, 1 spearhead, 4 Roman Coins, a tongue-shaped object of bronze, a bronze needle, numerous pins, + smal objects + several mediaeval items.
pageContext.collection: Private Collection,1923,Lady Stanier. The Citadel,No. 2,Preston Brockhurst, Salop.,Purchased by the late Sir Beville Stanier,From 2nd + 3rd Viscounts Hill
pageContext.site: England,Shropshire,Weston,Found in ruins of Red Castle, Hawkstone
